participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: A disciplined and straightforward individual, Jake has a strong sense of duty and loyalty.
participant_1.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i live in canada. i did not graduate high school. i am in the army.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is a laid-back and friendly guy who enjoys working with his hands and listening to music.
participant_2.background: i like to work on vintage cars. my favorite music is country. i like to go to country concerts on weekends. i own two vintage mustangs.

content.text: I am not a fan of that. I do like to watch tv though.
